fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Communication

Audiovisual and media policy

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Member of the Advertising Information Group (AIG). 
 
The Advertising Information Group is a European tripartite information, monitoring and analysis body shaped by the common principles and policies of its founding members.
goals__remit: To promote the role, rights, and responsibilities of advertising. The AA brings together agencies, brands and media to seek consensus on the issues and opportunities that affect them.
